Achievements.Name: Time to reload
Achievements.Description: Completed the game on Cadet difficulty

Achievements.Name: Regular soldier
Achievements.Description: Completed the game on Marksman difficulty

Achievements.Name: Hard as nails
Achievements.Description: Completed the game on Sniper Elite difficulty

Achievements.Name: True sniper
Achievements.Description: Completed the game on Authentic difficulty

Achievements.Name: Dedicated soldier
Achievements.Description: Completed 100% of the campaign on any difficulty

Achievements.Name: You'll try anything once
Achievements.Description: Played 1 mission in each mode (campaign, challenges, competitive multiplayer)

Achievements.Name: Ghost of Tobruk
Achievements.Description: Clear the mountain pass without alerting the enemy (Mission 1)

Achievements.Name: Well, well, well
Achievements.Description: Hid a body in each of the wells in Gaberoun

Achievements.Name: End of the 'lein'
Achievements.Description: Find and kill the visiting General (Mission 3)

Achievements.Name: I Fort this would be difficult.
Achievements.Description: Get to the informant without being spotted (Mission 4)

Achievements.Name: I Siwa you did there
Achievements.Description: Make the target officer's death look like an accident (Mission 5)

Achievements.Name: Double tap
Achievements.Description: Incapacitated 2 vehicles in Kasserine Pass within 5 seconds

Achievements.Name: Three birds, one stone
Achievements.Description: Destroy all 3 bomb dumps at the same time (Mission 7)

Achievements.Name: Long way down
Achievements.Description: Throw an enemy off one of the bridges (Mission 8)

Achievements.Name: Officer material
Achievements.Description: Attained a rank of Second Lieutenant (level 31)

Achievements.Name: Through the looking glass
Achievements.Description: Killed 10 snipers before they see you

Achievements.Name: Hidden and dangerous
Achievements.Description: Completed a campaign mission without being seen (excluding Tobruk)

Achievements.Name: These are a few of my favourite things
Achievements.Description: Got a kill with each offensive item

Achievements.Name: Tactical distractor
Achievements.Description: Distracted 20 enemies with flint or rocks

Achievements.Name: Double the distance
Achievements.Description: Sniped enemies over a cumulative distance of a double marathon

Achievements.Name: Conserving oxygen
Achievements.Description: Hold your breath for an hour

Achievements.Name: Highly decorated
Achievements.Description: Earned 1 of every ribbon in competitive multiplayer

Achievements.Name: Indestructible
Achievements.Description: Completed a mission after losing over 500 units of health

Achievements.Name: Charlie's Challenge
Achievements.Description: Get a testicle-shot from over 100m away
